statements: UPDATE QualityControlDashboards SET dashboard_name = 'New Dashboard Name', last_updated = NOW(), metrics = '{"metric1": 100, "metric2": 200}' WHERE dashboard_id = 'a0eebc99-9c0b-4ef8-bb6d-6bb9bd380a11';
